splits.name: Arch Capital Group Ltd.
splits.notes: Shareholders approved amendment enabling split at annual meeting (8-K filed May 15, 2018). Record date Jun 18, 2018. Payable date Jun 20, 2018. Ex-distribution date Jun 21, 2018. Second 3-for-1 split (first was May 2011). Bermuda-domiciled company.

splits.name: Aflac Incorporated
splits.notes: Board approved Feb 13, 2018. Record date Mar 2, 2018. Payable date Mar 16, 2018. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 19, 2018. Implemented as 100% stock dividend. Ninth split since NYSE listing in 1974, first in 17 years.

splits.name: Meta Financial Group, Inc.
splits.notes: Announced Aug 28, 2018. Record date Sep 20, 2018. Payable date Oct 4, 2018. Split-adjusted trading began Oct 5, 2018. Forward stock split implemented as stock dividend of two additional shares per share. Company renamed to Pathward Financial, Inc. in July 2022.

splits.name: HEICO Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved Dec 15, 2017. Record date Jan 3, 2018. Payable date Jan 17, 2018. Split-adjusted trading began Jan 18, 2018. Effected as 25% stock dividend on both Common Stock (HEI) and Class A Common Stock (HEI.A). 16th stock split or stock dividend since 1995.

splits.name: HEICO Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved Jun 12, 2018. Record date Jun 21, 2018. Payable date Jun 27, 2018. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 28, 2018. Effected as 25% stock dividend on both Common Stock (HEI) and Class A Common Stock (HEI.A). 17th stock split or stock dividend since 1995, second split in past year.

splits.name: Herbalife Nutrition Ltd.
splits.notes: Shareholder approval at Annual General Meeting Apr 24, 2018. Record date May 7, 2018. Distribution date May 14, 2018. Split-adjusted trading began May 15, 2018. Implemented as 100% stock dividend. Company name changed from Herbalife Ltd. to Herbalife Nutrition Ltd. effective Apr 25, 2018.

splits.name: Trex Company, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved May 7, 2018. Record date May 23, 2018. Distribution date Jun 18, 2018. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 19, 2018. Implemented as 100% stock dividend.
